item.title: "A causal workflow in R with coupon marketing data"
item.description:
Introduction

This document demonstrates a complete causal inference workflow using real marketing data from the AmExpert 2019 Kaggle competition. The dataset contains transaction records, coupon assignments, and customer demographics from a retail store that ran 18 marketing campaigns. Our goal is to estimate the causal effect of receiving specific coupon â€¦
